definition: to come up with an idea/generation of ideas/inspiration
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)

sentences.english: Where do creative people get their ideas?
sentences.chinese: 創意人如何發想他們的創意？

sentences.english: Everything is designed with your comfort in mind.
sentences.chinese: 每項設計都是依您的舒適需求而發想。

sentences.english: The course is going to discuss different ways of the new originality development.
sentences.chinese: 本課程首先討論創意發想的數種方法。

definition: axis/principal axis (in mechanics, optics, botany etc)/main axle (of engine)
to establish ties or contact/in series connection (electricity)
inspiration/insight/a burst of creativity in scientific or artistic endeavor
to have a unique style of one's own (idiom)
to design/to plot/to plan out/to compose/to draw a mental sketch/conception/plan/idea/composition
to construct (often sth abstract, such as good relations)/to set up/to develop/construction (abstract)/architecture
to act as/used erroneously for 作為|作为
to pile up/to put layer upon layer/(Tw) (computing) stack
